Summary: 3 teardrop shaped fireball objects traveling at an extremely high rate of speed
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around July 28th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were driving west on the 202 San Tan Freeway around 10:35pm on Saturday night, July 28, 2012. We were approaching the Dobson street exit when we noticed 3 objects hovering high in the evening sky. At first we both thought they were triangles but after viewing for a few moments we decided they were more of a teardrop shape. After looking up for about 2 minutes the three object ascended at an incredible rate of speed in unison. There was no sign on them again.
